comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/140217#issuecomment-1386702231 - It has been fixed yesterday, but the problem is that ad blockers based on Manifest V3 cannot update filters (it's necessary to update the whole extension), so it will probably be fixed in the next version of the extension.

Please add these rules:
```adblock
@@||crackle.com/vendor/adex.js
crackle.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'data.device.adsParams')
```
to the user rules.
